display_long_description:
Instinct is a high-energy, arcade-style VR shooter designed to test your reflexes, precision, and endurance. Built exclusively for Meta Quest headsets, it delivers a pure, uninterrupted adrenaline rush where every second of survival pushes you closer to mastery.
--
Step into the center of a glowing, ever-changing arena where the world reacts to your every move. You’re armed with dual sci-fi pistols and surrounded by threats : floating enemies, shifting hazards, and relentless pressure. There are no levels, no missions, and no breaks. You survive for as long as your focus holds, and every extra second you stay alive earns you bragging rights on the global leaderboard.
--
Instinct captures the thrill of classic arcade shooters : distilled into an immersive VR experience that rewards skill, speed, and instinctual decision-making.
--
Core Features :
>> True VR Reflex Gameplay – Designed entirely around quick reactions, full spatial awareness, and precision shooting.
>> Dual-Wield Control – Shoot independently with both hands using intuitive XR controller triggers.
>> Dynamic Difficulty – The game analyzes the way you play the game and adjusts the diffculty at runtime
--
Upcoming Features:
Expanded Enemy Types, Arena variations, Challeng Modes, Customization Options, Leaderboards and VR comfort enhancements
--
Feedbacks:
Your feedback is at the heart of how we build Instinct. Please review or mail us if you have any ideas or suggestions to improve the game. Every review counts :D
